responses: Welcome! How can we assist you today?
How can we help you today?
What can we do for you?

patterns: What ICT products do you sell?
responses: We offer a wide range of ICT products including laptops, desktops, tablets, and accessories.
Our products include laptops, desktops, tablets, and a variety of accessories.

patterns: How can I track my order?
Can I check my order status?
responses: You can track your order by logging into your account and checking the order status.
To track your order, please log in to your account and view the order status.
Delivery times vary depending on your location and chosen delivery method.
We offer standard and express delivery options. Delivery times may vary.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with credit card?
responses: We accept credit card, PayPal, and bank transfer for payments.
You can pay using credit card, PayPal, or bank transfer.

patterns: How do I return a product?
responses: You can return a product within 30 days for a full refund. Please see our return policy for details.
Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase for a refund or exchange.

patterns: Can I get help with technical issues?
responses: Our customer support team is available 24/7 via phone, email, or live chat.
For assistance with technical issues or other inquiries, please contact our support team.
